Posts.Content: KellyJo1987 wrote: My mom recentely had a lumpectomy. She now has lymphedema IN her breast and nowhere else so far. We have read that this is not very common. She has tried wearing two+ bras at a time and are going to get some better "compression" bras. Has anyone ever had this problem? Or have any advice on how to help get rid of this. Thanks :) Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Lymphedema IN the Breast... KellyJo1987 kira
